page.title: 06FRISKNEY HOUSING
page.content: Just over half the homes are owner-occupied, the rest being rented. About 2/3 of the rented accommodation is owned by the Council. The remainder is private, Almshouses or Charity Trust property. There are few tied houses. Apart from 2 blocks of 2 story flats at Fold Hill homes are houses or bungalows. About 60% of these are detached. There are 3 derelict and 10 empty houses, 1 holiday home and 3 caravans. There is a steady but small number of new homes being built using traditional methods and materials. New bungalows are the most popular. There is little speculative building, most homes being built with a specific person in mind. The age, type and condition of the housing varies a great deal but a fair amount of repair, renovation and modernisation is taking place.
